actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to authorize the transfer of one of the Gettysburg Address manuscripts from the custody of the Library of Congress to the custody of the  Secretary of the Interior.

summary.text: Directs the Librarian of Congress to transfer one of the Gettysburg Address manuscripts to the Secretary of the Interior for the purpose of placing such manuscript on display in Gettysburg National Park, Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the transfer of one of the Gettysburg Address manuscripts from the custody of the Library of Congress to the custody of the  Secretary of the Interior.
